remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
csbiegf.1 $e |- ( A e. V -> F/_ x C ) $.
csbiegf.2 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
csbiegf $p |- ( A e. V -> [_ A / x ]_ B = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
